__e: You see someone who did something terrible, who deserves to suffer, who doesn't deserve to live.
No, it wasn't until I killed my daughter, till I did something horrific that what I think matters.
You've done a horrible thing, and... I know... that you wish to God that you didn't.
Who would do something like this?
No but who else could have done this terrible thing?
I don't want to hurt him, trust me, But sometimes to do something good, We must first do something terrible.
Uh, yeah, something, uh... something pretty terrible happened, actually.
It's my dad-- something horrible's happened!
Something terrible has happened. It's taken our children away.
Something terrible has happened. It's taken our children away.
Something terrible happened and I had to run.
If this is such a terrible thing, how come it hasn't been in the newspaper?
What the hell kind of a thing is that to say to a woman?
No, it wasn't, and that was a terrible thing to say.
I have something horrible to tell you and I don't know how to say it.
I'm sorry to tell you that something terrible happened at your house today.
It's like she was always waiting for something bad to happen, and... I guess it finally did.
What happened that is so awful... you simultaneously can't speak of it... and yet can't stop talking about it?
Mary... what if something was going on, something terrible... and you knew that there was no way on earth that one man could stop it?
And I love my brother- and if he doesn't get this message, something horrible's gonna happen to him.
You're right, but a really bad thing is gonna happen, and I want to stop it, and you're the only person in the entire world that can help me.
